paper_abstract: This paper surveys several alternative data structures and algorithms for multiplying sparse upper-triangular matrices over closed semirings, and evaluates their efficiency in computing transitive closures of matrices over the Boolean semiring. Two new variants are introduced that outperform previously known methods on a collection of large data-sets drawn from linguistic applications. (c) 2005 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Efficient transitive closure of sparse matrices over closed semirings
